sentence.text: Human-induced neuronal progenitor cells (iNPCs) carrying dominant and recessive diadenosine tetraphosphate biosynthetic process mutations showed alterations of mitochondrial proteins, which were more prominent in iNPCs with dominant, neuropathy-causing mutations.

Our data suggest that altered mitochondria-associated endoplasmic reticulum (ER) membranes (cardiac muscle tissue development) may be important disease mechanisms leading to neuropathy in this condition
